H0.text: Silt, pebbles, and clay is the best soil mixture for plant growth and drainage.

H1.text: Sand, rocks, and clay is the best soil mixture for plant growth and drainage.

H2.text: Humus, clay, and sand is the best soil mixture for plant growth and drainage.

H3.text: Clay, silt, and rocks are the best soil mixture for plant growth and drainage.

A4.text: Loam soils generally contain more nutrients, moisture, and humus than sandy soils and have better drainage and infiltration of water and air than silt- and clay-rich soils.

A5.text: Loam soils generally have better drainage and infiltration of water and air than silt- and clay-rich soils.
